definition: to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to fall and break/to break (bones) by falling
to knock/to grasp sth in the hand and beat it/to toughen oneself up
to fall and smash into pieces
to fall/fig. to suffer a setback
lit. to smash a cracked pot (idiom); crazy despair in the face of a blemish, defect, error or setback
to injure oneself in a fall

sentences.english: Two jockeys were thrown in the second race.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個騎師在第二場賽馬時摔了下來。

sentences.english: It flamed out and fell heavily on the table.
sentences.chinese: 那機器人最終噴出火花重重地摔在桌面上。

sentences.english: She pushed me right out the drive-thru window and onto the customer's car.
sentences.chinese: 我直接摔出了窗口摔在了客人的車上。

sentences.english: His feet stuck up in the air.
The horse twisted and bucked and finally dismounted its rider.
sentences.chinese: 那匹馬扭動並猛然弓背躍起把騎手摔下馬。

sentences.english: He dashed the bowl to bits on a rock.
sentences.chinese: 他把碗跌在岩石上摔得粉碎。

sentences.english: The crippled child tumbled down the stairs and was badly hurt .
sentences.chinese: 這個殘疾小孩從樓梯上摔了下來，傷的很重。

sentences.english: He chopped down the beanstalk and the giant came crashing down with a tremendous thud.
sentences.chinese: 巨人隨着巨大的撞擊聲摔了下來。

sentences.english: A cowboy fell off his horse and broke his leg on the prairie.
sentences.chinese: 一個牛仔在大草原上從馬背上摔了下來，摔斷了腿。

sentences.english: He crashed the glass against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃猛力地向牆上摔赴。

sentences.english: He dashed a cup down in a temper.
My glasses slipped from my hand and smashed on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼鏡從手中滑下去，在地板上摔得粉碎。

sentences.english: While I was watching out for debris, I fell down a staircase.
sentences.chinese: 當我在注意墜物的時候，我從樓梯間摔了下來。

sentences.english: But it was uprooted in fury and thrown to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 但這葡萄樹因忿怒被拔出摔在地上。

sentences.english: When i'm splattered all over the ground below.
sentences.chinese: 當我摔到地上血濺橫飛的時候。

sentences.english: Be: Ahhh, I cannot even spank our door.
sentences.chinese: 恩，我甚至不敢摔我們家的門。

definition: to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to fall flat on one's face (vulgar)
to fall and smash into pieces
to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
to fall flat on one's face
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
to fall headlong/(fig.) to suffer an ignominious failure
